content: I'm actually still experimenting with flavors, so these suggestions are really helpful. I've been playing around with mango puree recently, so the Spicy Mango Mule caught my attention. Speaking of mango, I used it to make a signature cocktail for my last BBQ, and it was a huge hit. I added a splash of smoky mezcal to give it a unique twist. By the way, do you have any tips on how to pair cocktails with spicy food?
